original_data.Title: Post Graduate Program in Cyber Security
original_data.Short Intro: This Post Graduate Program in Cyber Security is designed to equip you with the skills required to become an expert in the rapidly growing field of Cyber Security. This cyber security program aims to help you stay abreast of all the latest trends in cyber security as well.

unified_data.title: Post Graduate Program in Cyber Security
unified_data.description: This Post Graduate Program in Cyber Security is designed to equip you with the skills required to become an expert in the rapidly growing field of Cyber Security. This cyber security program aims to help you stay abreast of all the latest trends in cyber security as well.
learning_outcomes: Implement security measures to protect networks and systems from threats.
Utilize SIEM tools for security monitoring and threat detection.
Analyze malware samples to understand their functionality and impact.
Understand core cybersecurity principles and practices.
Develop incident response plans to mitigate the impact of security breaches.
Apply ethical hacking techniques to identify vulnerabilities in systems.
